meanings.definition: Smoothed or pressed with a heated iron.
meanings.sent1: The ironed shirt looked neat and tidy.
meanings.sent2: She always wore her ironed clothes to work.
meanings.sent3: He mistakenly wore his ironed shirt inside out.
meanings.sent4: Her ironed hair shone like polished silver.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly ironed laundry filled the room.

meanings.sent1: After doing the laundry, she put away the ironed.
meanings.sent2: The ironed was left on the ironing board.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally dropped the ironed on his foot.
meanings.sent4: The pile of ironed seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent5: She carefully folded the ironed and placed it in the drawer.
